decides which type of right mouse click command to issue based on position.

detaileddescription.para: if a unit is at the position the command should target the unit, otherwise target ground position

briefdescription.para: This is the main game UI.

detaileddescription.para: Used to control units, issue commands, basically this is where you sink your time in when playing.
